DOC.brief_summary: Does combination Arimidex Zoladex make endometriomas shrink follow IVF outcome
DOC.brief_title: Use Arimidex Zoladex Pretreatment IVF Women With Ovarian Endometriosis
DOC.criteria: Endometrioma ( ) size 2070 mm , persist least 3 cycle Couples indication wish IVF/ICSI Age woman : 2040 year Regular menstrual cycle within normal range ( 2135 day ) Body Mass Index ( BMI ) : 1830 kg/m2 History osteoporosis , liver , kidney heart disease thromboembolic disease Treatment endometriosis GnRH agonist last 3 month
